p: In this study, pumpkin seed oil (PSO) was used as a protective agent. Pumpkin ( Cucurbita pepo) is cultivated for human utilization and as functional food or medicine [ 21]. It is rich in various antioxidants and valuable nutritional components such as essential fatty acids, amino acids, phytosterols, Î²-carotenes and selenium [ 22]. Furthermore, it contains phenolic compounds as tyrosol, vanillic acid, vanillin, ferulic acid, and luteolin [ 23]. In addition, it shown to contain high levels of tocopherol that interpret its antioxidant activity and consequently may be able to reduce lipid peroxidation [ 24].
